org.opensha2.data

Class HazardCurve

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opensha2.data.ArrayXY_Sequence
      • org.opensha2.data.HazardCurve
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<XY_Point>, XY_Sequence

    public class HazardCurve
extends ArrayXY_Sequence
    A custom XY_Sequence whose y-values must decrease monotonically. This check is made upon creation with new data but is not be enforced as y-values are updated/mutated.
    Version:
    $Id:$
    Author:
    Peter Powers

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static HazardCurve create(double[] xs,
                 double[] ys)
        Create a new sequence from the supplied value arrays.
        Parameters:
        xs - x-values to initialize sequence with
        ys - y-values to initialize sequence with; may be null
        Returns:
        an array based sequence
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if xs are null
        IllegalArgumentException - if xs and ys are not the same size
        IllegalArgumentException - if xs does not increase monotonically or contains repeated values
